Text: Live Web Blast The Future of WirelessIMAGE IMAGE IMAGE Join George Gilder Dr Irwin Jacobs and senior representatives from the CDG CTIA Comisin Nacional de Comunicaciones Argentina FCC Leap NextWave and QUALCOMM for three live interactive sessions at the CDMA Americas Congress If youre unable to be one of the hundreds of delegates attending the Americas Congress in San Diego October November ensure that you participate in our way webcast of the opening presentations and discussions at the event As a member of our Internet audience you can interact with the presenters by submitting questions that will be addressed live during the webcast Participation is limited and preregistration is required The cost for all three sessions is webcasts not sold separately Wherever you are in the world you can play a part in the most important CDMA event in the Americas this year To secure your participation please click here For full CDMA Americas Congress event details click here Webcast Times All times listed are US Keynote George Gilder Chairman Gilder Group Inc Thursday November st at AM PDT AM EDT State of the Industry Address Dr Irwin Jacobs Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Qualcomm Thursday November st at AM PDT PM EDT Panel Discussion G in the Americas Exploring the diverse challenges and opportunities Thursday November st at AM PDT PM EDT In this opening session wireless industry experts debate the key issues that are shaping the future of wireless communications in the Americas and in the rest of the world Trends uptake spectrum and revenue generation Moderator IMAGE Perry LaForge Executive Director CDMA Development Group Panelists IMAGE Tom Wheeler President Cellular Telecommunications Internet Association IMAGE Carlos Killian Vicepresidente Comisin Nacional de Comunicaciones Argentina IMAGE Tom Sugrue Chief Wireless Telecommunications Bureau FCC IMAGE Susan G Swenson President COO Leap IMAGE Allen Salmasi CEO NextWave IMAGE Dr Paul Jacobs Group President Wireless Internet Group QUALCOMM Join the worlds leading companies at the CDMA Americas Congress When your payment is processed you will receive a password which will enable to you access all three interactive webcasts as well as full information and technical support details To ensure that you are ready to view and participate in this webcast please make sure that you have completed the System Check Simply click here and follow the instructions If you have any questions or need additional information please contact Digevents Support Technicians at or option Webcasts will be available for a limited time post broadcast IMAGE This message was sent by Institute for International Research using Responsys Interact TM Click here if you prefer not to
